.. |grappelli| replace:: Grappelli
.. |filebrowser| replace:: FileBrowser

.. _releasenotes:

FileBrowser 3.8 Release Notes
=============================

FileBrowser 3.8 is compatible with Django 1.10 as well as Grappelli 2.9.

Updates
-------

* Compatibility with Django 1.10 and Grappelli 2.9

Update from FileBrowser 3.7.x
-----------------------------

* Update Django to 1.10 and check https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/releases/1.10/
* Update Grappelli to 2.9.x
* Update FileBrowser to 3.8.x
